column2: "Na EWURADZE n’asɛm baa Hanani ba Jehu nkyɛn tsiaa Baasha
column3: dɛ
column5: "Susuampa dɛ memaa wo do fii huntuma mu
column6: na mehyɛɛ wo ɔpanyin wɔ me man Israel do; na ɔwo anantsew Jeroboam no kwan mu
column7: na ama me man Israel ayɛ bɔn
column8: na wɔdze hɔn bɔn eyi me ebufuw ntsi;"

column2: "hwɛ
column3: mebɛpra Baasha na ne fi korakora; na mebɛyɛ wo fi dɛ Nebat ne ba Jeroboam ne fi."

column2: "Nyia ofi Baasha mu a obowu wɔ kurow mu no nkraman bedzi; na nedze mu nyia obowu wɔ haban mu no
column3: wimu ntumbowa bedzi."

column2: "Afei Baasha no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Baasha kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no Tirza; na ne babanyin Ela na odzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Na nkyii so EWURADZE n’asɛm nam Hanani ne ba
column3: nkɔnhyɛnyi Jehu n’abaw do bae betsiaa Baasha na ne fi
column4: osian mbusu a ɔbɔɔ no wɔ EWURADZE enyi do nyinara ntsi
column5: dɛ ɔdze ne nsaano edwuma yii no ebufuw yɛɛ dɛ Jeroboam ne fi no

column2: "Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia eduonu esia no mu na Baasha ne babanyin Ela hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Tirza
column3: na odzii hen mfe ebien."

column2: "Na n’akowaa Zimri a ɔyɛ ne ntseaseanam mu fa do safohen no
column3: paam ne tsir do: na dabi a ɔnodze ɔwɔ Tirza ronom nsa abow wɔ Arza a ɔhwɛ ahemfiefo do wɔ Tirza no ne fie no:"

column2: "na Zimri kɔr hɔ na ɔkɔwɔɔ no kum no
column3: wɔ Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia eduonu esuon no mu

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase ridzi hen no
column4: ntsɛmara a ɔtsenaa n’ahengua do no
column5: nna okum Baasha fifo nyinara: oenngyaa no ɔbanyimba kor mpo

column2: "Dɛm na Zimri sɛɛ Baasha fi nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam nkɔnhyɛnyi Jehu do kae tsiaa Baasha no tse no
column6: na ne ba Ela no bɔn a ɔyɛe
column7: na wɔdze maa Israel so yɛɛ bɔn

column2: "Afei Ela no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia eduonu esuon no mu na Zimri dzii hen nda esuon wɔ Tirza. Afei nna Israelman no akyer Gibeton a ɔyɛ Filistiafo dze no ho nsera."
"Na aber a hɔn a wɔakyer nsera no tsee dɛ wɔrese dɛ
column3: Zimri akɔ apam
column4: na eso oeku ɔhen no: dɔm no nyinara dze dɔm do safohen Omri hyɛɛ hen wɔ Israel do da no ara wɔ nsera no mu."

column2: "Na Omri fi Gibeton sii mu kɔree
column3: na Israel akofo nyinara ka no ho

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Zimri hun dɛ kurow no wɔagye no
column4: nna osii mu kɔr ɔhen no ne fi aban no mu
column5: na ɔdze ogya hyeew ɔhen no ne fi no guu no do
column8: "osian no bɔn a ɔyɛe dɛ ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column10: na no bɔn a ɔyɛe dze maa Israel yɛɛ bɔn no mu ntsi."

column2: "Afei Zimri no ho nsɛm nkaa no na no nkontompɔ a otwae no
column3: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Nna Israelmba no mu paa ekuw ebien: ɔman no mu fa dzii Ginat ne ba Tibni ekyir
column3: dɛ wɔbɛhyɛ no hen: na ɔfa so dzii Omri ekyir."

column2: "Na ɔman no a wodzii Omri ekyir no nsa daa ɔman no a wodzii Ginat ne ba Tibni ekyir no do: na Tibni wui
column3: na Omri dzii hen."

column2: "Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia eduasa biako no mu na Omri hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do
column3: na odzii hen mfe duebien: mfe esia na ɔdze dzii hen wɔ Tirza."

column2: "Na ɔkɔtɔɔ Samaria koko wɔ Semer hɔ maa dwetɛ ndwetɛbona ebien; na ɔkyekyeer koko no do kurow
column3: na ɔdze koko no wura Semer ne dzin frɛɛ kurow a ɔkyekyeree no ne dzin dɛ Samaria."

column2: "Na Omri yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: na ɔyɛɛ emumuyɛdze seen hɔn a wodzii n’enyim nyinara."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔnantseew Nebat ba Jeroboam no kwan nyinara
column3: na no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel fomee no mu
column4: dɛ wɔdze hɔn egyangyandze yii EWURADZE

column2: "Afei Omri no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: dza ɔyɛe
column4: na ne mbanyinndam a ɔkyerɛe no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Nna Omri kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ Samaria: na ne babanyin Ahab dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Na Judahen Asa n’afe a otsia eduasa awɔtwe no mu Omri ne ba Ahab hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Israel do: na Omri ne ba Ahab dzii hen wɔ Israel do wɔ Samaria mfe eduonu ebien."
"Na Omri ne ba Ahab yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyim seen hɔn a wodzii n’enyim nyinara."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: dɛ gyama ɔyɛ adze harhar ma no dɛ ɔbɛnantsew Nebat ne ba Jeroboam no bɔn mu no ntsi
column4: nna ɔfaa Zidonfo hen Etbaal ne babaa Jezebel ayewar
column5: na osii mu kɔree kɔsoom Baal

column2: "Na osii afɔrmbukyia maa Baal wɔ Baal fi a osii no wɔ Samaria no mu."
"Na Ahab yɛɛ Asera no; na Ahab kɔr do araa dɛ ɔdze beyi EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no ebufuw sen Israel ahemfo a wodzii n’enyim nyinara."

column2: "Ne nda mu na Bɛtɛlnyi Hiel kyekyeer Jeriko: ɔhweer n’abakan Abiram dze toow ne fapem
column3: na ɔhweer ne ba kaekyir banyin Segub sisii n’ano mbobotsen; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n’asɛm a ɔnam Nun ne ba Josua abaw do kae no tse."
